author: cbs8
title: Tube Heroes Announces Exclusive Toys Available at New York Comic Con
text:
Jazwares/Tube Heroes
SUNRISE, Fla. and NEW YORK , Oct. 5, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- YouTube gaming fans looking to pick up limited edition collectible action figures at New York Comic Con can head over to the Jazwares/ Tube Heroes booth 556 and find toy versions of favorites including Ali-A, DanTDM, CaptainSparklez, KSI, Sky, and many more. The Tube Heroes limited editions will be available at New York Comic Con with daily meet and greets and autograph signings with Ali-A taking place from 11:00 am to 1:00 pm and 3:00 pm to 5:00 pm October 8 , 9 and 10th.
Tube Heroes takes New York Comic Con by superhero storm where Ali-A will debut as a Tube Hero and will show his collectible toy figure for the first time. Inspired by the demand of digital fans' values of " Real is the New Cool ", Jazwares' Tube Heroes announces a collectible series of exclusive mini figures and 6" vinyl figures at New York Comic Con October 8-11th at booth 556. The toy products feature digitalverse's most popular gaming stars and target GenZ kids looking to meet (and take home) their favorite YouTube star.
Some of the Tube Heroes available as exclusive collectible merchandise in the New York Comic Con are:
CaptainSparklez - Popular for his "Minecraft Mods", DanTDM - one of the most popular YouTubers in the world, KSI - British YouTube star mainly known for FIFA videos and comedic sketches, Ali-A - British YouTube icon and occasional collaborator with the Ultimate Sidemen group. Tweens and teens will be able to meet Ali-A in person at the Tube Heroes Booth 556 October 8-10th . Exclusive Tube Heroes Merchandise includes
Collector's edition set of 19 two-inch mini figures of YouTube gaming stars Six inch vinyl figures of CaptainSparklez, KSI and Sky Free Giveaways for Tube Heroes fans:
Ali-A 2.75" collectible figure, sword, shield and headphones Ali-A Mood Cups Ali-A mini posters and stickers Tube Heroes postcards What's the Big Tube Heroes Deal?
Tubes Heroes are real-life YouTube gaming personalities who give new meaning to the term action hero. These heroes come from all around the Digitalverse. With more than 131 million YouTube subscribers and 31 billion views, they play an influential role to teens and tweens following the gaming industry.
Why Tube Heroes? Gen Z says: Real is the New Cool
"Real is the new cool when it comes to today's Gen Z kids," said Judd Zebersky , CEO of Jazwares - a leading manufacturer of toy and entertainment innovation. "Online real life tube heroes are the new superheroes of our time. Fans interact with them on a daily basis and have been begging for the product. It is with great excitement that Jazwares is able to work closely with top influencers not only to introduce the product in many categories but also to build compelling stories with our very talented Tube Heroes."
Besides New York Comic Con, fans can subscribe to Tube Heroes on YouTube or find the persona-branded action figures and plush toys at Target, Walmart, Toys R Us, and other retail locations. Stay "tubed" for more on New York Comic Con news and more by following us on Twitter and Liking us on Facebook and subscribing to YouTube.
About Tube Heroes, a brand of Jazwares, LLC
With its focus on creativity, innovation and function, Jazwares has established itself as a well-respected leader in the licensed products industry. Delivering diverse lines of toys and consumer electronics, the company's products feature some of the best entertainment properties in the world like Minecraft®, Peppa Pig®, Terraria®, Adventure Time®, Plants vs. Zombies®, Star Wars® and Teen Titans Go!®, among others. Jazwares' goal is to invent toys and related products that are new to the marketplace. , With major retailers presence globally, Jazwares features the brands that kids want, at an affordable price. For more information about Jazwares, Inc., please visit www.jazwares.com
About New York Comic Con
New York Comic Con, the crown jewel of New York Super Week, will take place October 8-11 at the Javits Center in New York City . The show is the East Coast's biggest and most exciting popular culture convention with the latest and greatest in comics, graphic novels, anime, manga, video games, toys, movies, and television.
